title: Generative AI-Integrated Science English Speaking Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic scientific terminology and fundamental conversational skills
context.additional_context: A course for current science professionals to improve English speaking skills required in their work environment. Conducted asynchronously via an LMS and accessible through personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can deliver fluent English presentations of over 5 minutes on science topics through role-playing with generative AI.
Learners can construct accurate scientific explanations using specialized terminology based on peer assessment and AI feedback.
Learners improve their communication self-efficacy in job-related situations by over 20% through AI role-playing exercises.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
